section.title: References
section.para: Old versions of this application were presented in six international events during 2010 and 2011[1]. For more information about the application you can browse the main developers blogs[2] . All the application features are open to the community and we encourage people to participate from the project to learn about these technologies. The application source code is fully available to download and is licensed under the Apache Software License 2.0 [3].

[1]:
RuleML, Fort Lauderdale, FL - US 2011 (Second Position @ Demo Chanllange)
Rules Fest, San Francisco, CA - US 2011
Jazoon, Zurich - Switzerland 2011
Judcon, Boston - US 2011
Drools Workshop, Buenos Aires - Argentina 2011
Drools Boot Camps, New York & Washington - US 2011
Java One Brazil, Sao Paulo - 2011
JBoss In Bossa, Sao Paulo - Brazil 2010
[2]:
[3]:
